xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Mail Translations
xwikidoc.content: admin.email=Email admin.email.description=Configure email (general, mail sending, etc). admin.email.general=General admin.email.send=Mail Sending admin.email.status=Mail Sending Status Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass_obfuscate=Obfuscate Email Addresses Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass_obfuscate.hint=This affects only the email addresses stored in object properties of type Email, as long as the default custom displayer for the Email property type is not overwritten. Example: a...@domain.org Mail.SendMailConfigClass_from=Email address to send from Mail.SendMailConfigClass_from.hint=The default email address used to send notification emails from Mail.SendMailConfigClass_bcc=BCC email addresses Mail.SendMailConfigClass_bcc.hint=A default comma-separated list of BCC email addresses to use when sending mail Mail.SendMailConfigClass_host=Email Server Mail.SendMailConfigClass_host.hint=The SMTP server to send to. Defaults to "localhost" Mail.SendMailConfigClass_port=Email Server Port Mail.SendMailConfigClass_port.hint=The port of the SMTP server to use. Defaults to 25 Mail.SendMailConfigClass_username=Email Server Username (optional) Mail.SendMailConfigClass_username.hint=The username to connect to the SMTP server, for authenticating servers Mail.SendMailConfigClass_password=Email Server Password (optional) Mail.SendMailConfigClass_password.hint=The password to connect to the SMTP server, for authenticating servers Mail.SendMailConfigClass_properties=Additional Properties Mail.SendMailConfigClass_properties.hint=The list of additional JavaMail properties to use (e.g. "mail.smtp.starttls.enable=true" for TLS) Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.date=Date of event Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.batchID=Sending ID Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.messageID=Message ID Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.recipients=Recipients Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.state=Status Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.actions=Actions Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.resend=Resend
